value.title: Working hours without Holidays, weekends and by country in power query

In Power Query we have some functions using which we can convert our local date

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Create Row Number for Each Group in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: If you want to create a row-number statically as a pre-calculation in Power BI, then Power Query has a very simple way of doing it; Add Index Column. value.title: Decompress gzip files using Power BI and get access to @EU_Eurostat data.

Most data is stored in gzip files and you need to know how to decompress gzip files to be able to get the data. I will show you two methods in this video.  Link to Eurostat data portal: https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/data/database?node_code=demo_gind
